name: THE_MARRIAGE_GAME
description: Marry another character

name: A_POPE_OF_MY_OWN
description: Set up an antipope

name: ALL_THREE_POPES
description: Play a game where there are two simultaneous antipopes

name: EXALTED_AMONG_MEN
description: Fulfill the Become Exalted ambition

name: DEATH_DO_US_PART
description: Have your spouse assassinated

name: ALWAYS_BET_ON_DUKE
description: Work your way up from Count to Duke with a single character

name: FULL_HOUSE
description: Sire five children

name: CRUSADER
description: Fulfill the goal of a Crusade

name: PARAGON_OF_VIRTUE
description: Fulfill the Paragon of Virtue ambition

name: UNITED_THE_KINGDOMS
description: Hold the kingdoms of England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland

name: A_NORMAN_YOKE
displayName: On English Neck a Norman Yoke
description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as William the Bastard, become the King of England

name: GOOD_TO_BE_KING
displayName: It's Good to be the King
description: Work your way up from Count to King with a single character

name: BETTER_BE_EMPEROR
displayName: It's Better to be the Emperor
description: Work your way up from Count to Emperor with a single character

name: SURVIVOR
description: Play a game all the way through from 1066 to 1453

name: HARD_RULER
description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as Harald of Norway, become the King of England

name: CRUSADER_KING
description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark, hold the Kingdom of Jerusalem

name: PRESTER_JOHN
description: As a Catholic, have a border with Miaphysite Abyssinia

name: RUSSKAYA_PRAVDA
description: As a character with the Russian Culture, hold the Empire of Russia

name: THE_OUTSIDE_BET
description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as Svend II of Denmark, become the King of England

name: THE_HOLY_PLACES
description: Have Rome, Jerusalem, Mecca and Medina within your Realm

name: PENTARCH
description: As an Orthodox Christian, hold Rome, Constantinople, Alexandria, Antioch and Jerusalem

name: LEGACY_OF_ROME
description: Restore the Roman Empire

name: SPQR
description: As the Roman Empire, reclaim the old imperial borders

name: BRINGS_BENEFIT
description: As a Zoroastrian, become the prophesied Saoshyant

name: KINGDOM_OF_DAVID
description: As a Jew, create the Kingdom of Israel

name: NEW_WAYS
description: Reform one of the Pagan religions

name: TO_MECCA
description: Go on a Hajj to Mecca

name: PILGRIM
description: Go on a Christian Pilgrimage

name: DOGE_ELECT
description: As a Patrician, win an election and become Doge

name: MERCHANT_PRINCE
description: Amass more than 20,000 in wealth

name: SAINT
description: Amass more than 10,000 in piety

name: CELEBRITY
description: Amass more than 15,000 in prestige

name: DREAM_HOME
description: As a Patrician dynasty, build every upgrade for your Family Palace

name: TRADE_EMPIRE
description: Your Republic maintains trade posts in 80 provinces

name: KHAN_OF_KHANS
description: Conquer continental Western Europe as the Mongol Empire, starting in "Age of the Mongols" bookmark

name: VIKING_RAIDER
description: As a Viking, return home with 1,000 worth of loot

name: AND_STAY_OUT
description: Throw the Aztec invaders back into the sea

name: PERSISTENT_SURVIVOR
description: Play a game all the way through from 867 to 1453

name: DIVINE_BLOOD
description: Achieve a score of 100,000

name: DRAGON_BLOOD
description: Achieve a score of 50,000

name: ROYAL_BLOOD
description: Achieve a score of 10,000

name: BLACK_BISHOP
description: Fund an immoral bishop and get him elected Pope

name: CALIPHATE_STRIKES_BACK
description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as the Abbasid Caliph, become independent and hold an empire title

name: DECADENT_WARRIOR
description: As a Muslim, crush a Decadence revolt

name: IN_THE_FAMILY
description: Sire a child that has the Inbred trait

name: TURBULENT_PRIEST
description: Assassinate a vassal bishop that likes the Pope better than you

name: DWARF_FORTRESS
description: Have seven courtiers with the Dwarf trait

name: HOLY_SMOKE
description: Sacrifice another religion's head as a Norse or Aztec pagan

name: EMPRESSIVE
description: Play as three consecutive generations of empresses

name: BLACK_WIDOW
description: As a woman, have three different husbands killed

name: THE_BRITISH_RAJ
description: Rule the Empire of Britannia as a Hindu, Buddhist or Jain character

name: BEYOND_THE_INDUS
description: As a ruler of non-Indian culture, conquer a King or Emperor title in India

name: MY_VERY_OWN_SUBCONTINENT
description: Become Samrat Chakravartin

name: KALI_MAAA
description: Sacrifice a King or Emperor tier character to Kali

name: I_CAN_SEE_ITS_STRIPES
description: Kill a tiger by your own hand

name: GREAT_INDIAN_SULTANATE
description: Rule the Empire of Rajastan and convert all its provinces to Islam

name: SAINT_THOMAS_DREAM
description: Rule an Indian Kingdom or Empire as a Christian and convert all its provinces

name: WHAT_SCHISM
description: Convert both Rome and Constantinople to the same (Indian) religion

name: RED_SEA_RESORT
description: Convert Mecca to Hinduism, Buddhism or Jainism

name: LOOKING_EAST_AND_WEST
description: Be Emperor of both Persia and Rajastan

name: HOLY_AND_ROMAN
description: Found the Holy Roman Empire in a game starting in 769

name: EMPIRE_OF_THE_SUN
description: Rule as Emperor with the Reformed Zun Faith

name: SAXON_BLOOD
displayName: I Shed Blood of Saxon Men
description: As a Christian non-Saxon, completely conquer Saxony in a game starting in 769

name: SAXONS_UNITE
description: As an Anglo-Saxon or Saxon ruler, be king of both Saxony and England

name: FRISIAN_COAST
description: Be King of Frisia and hold the Atlantic coast from Léon in Brittany to Jylland

name: LITTLE_BROTHER
description: Become Emperor of Francia as Carloman, brother of Charlemagne

name: IRON_CROWN
description: Hold any Emperor or King title as a Lombard after 1300

name: VIKING_UMMAH
description: Have a capital province with Norse culture and Muslim religion

name: MEDIEVAL_SCHLIEFFEN
description: Be simultaneously at war with the Aztecs and the Mongols

name: DESIDERATA
description: Divorce a Lombard Princess as a Christian

name: SEVEN_CENTURIES
description: Play a game all the way through from 769 to 1453

name: NOT_A_TRIBE
description: Play as a Tribal Ruler and Reform to Feudalism

name: RES_PUBLICA
description: Play as a Tribal Ruler and Reform to Merchant Republic

name: GREAT_HUNTER
description: Kill your prey in the Epic Hunt

name: CASANOVA
description: Successfully seduce 10 people by targeted seduction with one character

name: MUDSLINGER
description: Successfully slander 20 people with one character

name: FAMILY_BLISS
description: Have 6 close family members as friends

name: WERE_IN_BUSINESS
description: Successfully establish a trade route

name: BRING_IT_ON
description: Win 7 duels with one character

name: WISE_GUY
description: Gain the Legendary Wisdom modifier

name: LETS_PLAY
description: Gain the Hedonist trait through carousing

name: STARGAZER
description: Build an Observatory

name: BY_THE_GODS
description: Gain the Theologian trait

name: STEPPE_BY_STEPPE
description: As a steppe horde, conquer the whole steppe region.

name: ASIAN_LAND_WAR
displayName: "Never start a Land War in Asia"
description: Start in Western Europe and completely conquer the region of Mongolia.

name: NORSE_EAST
description: As a Norse character, become King of Mongolia.

name: PAX_MONGOLICA
description: Build 3 fully upgraded silk road trade posts.

name: SWORD_PLOUGHSHARE
description: Settle a steppe mercenary with more than 20 martial in your lands.

name: LETS_GO_OUT_INTO_THE_FIELD
displayName: Let's go out into the Field
description: Defeat a sibling in a war using the rival casus belli.

name: TURK_BUSINESS
description: Conquer Constantinople as a Turkic steppe horde.

name: MANY_ARROWS
displayName: One Arrow Alone can be Easily Broken but Many Arrows are Indestructible
description: As a steppe horde, have a population of 150 000.

name: GO_WEST_YOUNG_MONGOL
description: As a steppe horde, have an independent tributary King or Emperor in the British Isles

name: VASCO_DA_GAMA
description: Own all the silk route ports in india as a European merchant republic.

name: RUN_WITH_THE_WOLF
description: Play as a character with Wolf's Blood.

name: THE_YES_MEN
description: Have all members of your council be Loyalists.

name: YOU_OWE_ME
description: Have someone owe you a Favor

name: SHADOW_PRINCE
description: Sit on the council and have every other council member as well as the ruler owing you a favor.

name: PAY_TO_WIN
description: Win a war using Mercenaries.

name: SOMEONE_PAID_TO_WIN
description: Create a mercenary band and have them bring in money for you.

name: ONE_IS_NOT_AMUSED
description: As a ruler have a council that is not content.

name: FOLLOW_ME
description: Successfully intervene in a youth's development to force one of your own traits onto them.

name: PRODIGIOUS_FIVE
description: Have at least one child with each of the five level four education traits.

name: I_AM_THE_LAW
description: As a vassal use a favor to change a law.

name: PEACE_IN_OUR_TIME
description: Enforce peace for 6 or more vassals.

name: HOSPITABLE
description: Build a Hospital.

name: PAPAL_MACHE
description: Have elephants trample the Pope/Caliph.

name: CLOSE_CALL
description: From Seclusion, kick someone out who had the plague.

name: AN_HONEST_MISTAKE
description: From Seclusion, kick someone out who did not have the plague.

name: NO_SOLICITORS
description: Go into Seclusion.

name: NOT_SO_BAD
description: Survive the End Times.

name: ETERNITY_DENIED
description: Kill a character with the Immortal trait.

name: THERE_CAN_BE_ONLY_ONE
description: Become immortal.

name: TYPHOID_MARY
description: Contract three symptoms.

name: SCARRRRRRED_FOR_LIFE
description: Become One-Eyed, One-Legged and One-Handed.

name: I_GOT_BETTER
description: Recover from the Black Death.

name: APTLY_NAMED
description: Die from the Black Death.

name: UNWELCOME_VISITORS
description: As an assassin, assassinate a Crusader King in the Holy land.

name: DARK_LORD
description: Become Grandmaster of any devil-worshiper society.

name: BIRTHRIGHT
description: As the Anti-Christ/spawn of Satan, become Grandmaster of the Satanists.

name: JIHAD_SULTAN
description: As a Muslim King or higher, become Grandmaster of the Assassins.

name: BLACK_POPE
description: Have a priest you corrupted (as a Satanist) become Pope.

name: SMASH_PATRIARCHY
description: As female Messalian/Bogomilist/Cathar Ruler own all 5 baronies which make up the Orthodox Pentarchies and have a female temple holder control them.

name: GOOD_OLD_DAYS
description: Have the kingdom of Frisia as your primary title and have the duchies of Flanders and Brabant be dejure part of it.

name: GOT_LAND
description: Start as the holder of Gotland and form the empire of Scandinavia.

name: LEGACY_INDO_NORSE
description: Start as a Norse Character, hold a Kingdom in India as your primary title. Your capital must also be located in India and converted to Norse.

name: OFF_WITH_THEIR_HEADS
description: Execute 10 or more prisoners in a single action.

name: ALADDIN
description: Starting and staying as a Han Chinese character, be an independent King or Emperor and rule all of North Africa (the Maghreb region).

name: TEN_THRONES
description: Have your dynasty rule 10 independent Feudal/Iqta/Monastic Feudal Kingdoms or Empires with at least 25 realm size each. You must be one of them.

name: A_SERVANT_NO_MORE
description: As Mu’nis al-Muzaffar of Galilee in 867, become an Emperor and have at least 100 realm size.

name: WHITE_HUN
description: Starting as the last remnant of the White Huns (the Count of Mohadavasaka in 769) restore the borders of the Hephthalite Empire.

name: THE_CONQUEROR
description: Starting as a Norse character, rule the Kingdom of England (or the Empire of Britannia) as an English cultured character of a Christian religion.

name: SAKYA_TRIZIN
description: Starting as the Count of Sakya in 1066, rule as an independent Buddhist King or Emperor and control all Buddhist Holy Sites.

name: CHILD_OF_THE_DRAGON
description: Request an Imperial Marriage from China.

name: BON_APPETIT
description: Eat a character of the Bön religion.

name: SNIPPED_OFF_TO_CHINA
description: Send a Eunuch to the Chinese Emperor.

name: A_CURIOUS_TRINKET
description: Send an invaluable artifact (Quality: 4 or 5) to the Emperor of China.

name: HEADHUNTER
description: Found a Bloodline as a particularly cunning, ruthless and skilled Duelist.

name: DEFENDER_OF_THE_HOLY_SEPULCHRE
description: Starting as Eustache de Boulogne (the Count of Boulogne in France) in 1066, choose to play as your beneficiary after they are made King or Queen in Jerusalem after a Crusade.

name: VENETIAN_GUILE
description: Win a Crusade targeting Byzantium.

name: DEUS_VULT
description: Create the Empire of the Outremer.

name: HISTORY_IS_IN_MY_BLOOD
description: Have 5 Historical Bloodlines on your character.

name: I_DO_NOT_PLAY_CHESS
description: Have 100 kills in your Kill List.

name: LEGLISE_CEST_MOI
description: As an Emperor, grab the crown out of the Pope's hands and crown yourself.

name: ZERO_TO_HERO
description: Found a Legendary Bloodline while part of a Warrior Lodge.

name: HEATHENOUS_WAYS
description: Starting as Erik the Heathen in 1066, rule the Kingdom of Sweden with the reformed Germanic Faith.

name: BY_JUPITER
description: Reform the Hellenic faith.

name: BLOODY_LINE
description: As a religion worshipping Bloodthirsty Gods, sacrifice enough people to found a Bloodline.

name: PAGAN_FURY
description: As a ruler with any Pagan religion, win a Christian Crusade targeting you.

name: UNDER_THE_POWER_OF_THE_ETERNAL_HEAVEN
displayName: Under the Power of the Eternal Heaven
description: As a member of the Ashina clan, solidify your divinity by ruling as Religious Head of the Reformed Tengri religion.

name: FROM_SERVANT_TO_SAINT
description: Have a character you used to play be proclaimed a saint and have their Saintly Bloodline running in your veins.

name: FAMILY_FIRST
description: As a character with a religion that practice Divine Marriages, have one of your siblings, parents and children as spouses/consorts at the same time.

name: BLESSED_REIGN_IN_AFRICA
displayName: Bless my Reign down in Africa
description: As a King or Emperor, have one of your domain Counties under the influence of a successful Rain Dance.

name: OVER_YOUR_DEAD_BODY
description: As a Tribal ruler, gain a title you have a claim on by duelling the holder.

name: CHECH_LECH_AND_RUS
description: Unite the Kingdoms of the three brothers, Lech, Czech and Rus, into one Slavic Union.

name: BAPTISM_OF_RUS
description: As an East Slavic Pagan King or Emperor with your capital in the Eastern Europe region, successfully ask the ruler of Byzantium for a mass conversion.

name: LOVE_IS_A_BATTLEFIELD
description: Find love after a duel.

name: FROM_THE_ASHES
description: Starting in a Shattered World, rule an Empire.

name: NOT_SO_GREAT
description: Starting in a Shattered World, defeat a Great Conqueror in a war.

name: RISE_OF_CIVILIZATION
description: In a Shattered World with ‘Holding Types’ set to ‘Tribal’ or ‘Tribal & Nomadic’, adopt Feudalism or Republicanism.

name: WHAT_COULD_HAVE_BEEN
description: Start a Random World with all possible settings set to ‘Random’ and play for 200 years.

name: LORD_OF_THE_FLIES
description: Start a Random World as a 0 year old Count, with the maximum character age set to 0, become King or Emperor within 16 years.
